mapper.select: select a.roomName, a.id, a.nickname, a.content, a.makedate, a.membercnt,b.cnt from ( select a.roomName, a.id, a.nickname, a.content, a.makedate, b.membercnt from ( select a.roomName, a.id, a.nickname, a.content, a.makedate from chat as a inner join ( select max(chno) as latest from chat group by roomName ) as b where a.chno = b.latest ) as a inner join ( select count(*) as membercnt, roomName from chatroom group by roomName ) as b on a.roomName = b.roomName ) as a inner join ( select a.roomName, b.cnt as cnt from ( select distinct roomName from chatroom where uid =#{uid} ) as a left join ( select count(*) as cnt, roomName from chat where isRead = 0 and id != #{uid} group by roomName )as b on a.roomName = b.roomName ) as b on a.roomName = b.roomName
select * from chatroom where roomName = #{roomName} and uid =#{uid}
mapper.delete: delete from chatroom where roomName = #{roomName} and uid =#{uid}
